citations.narrative:
At the time of inspection, the facility does not have updated records of acquisition and disposition. The facility is missing
the disposition records for a fallow deer (unknown disposition date) and a goat that was sold on 7 May 2025.
The records of acquisition, disposition, and animals on hand are necessary to track the movement of animals. Every
dealer other than operators of auction sales and brokers to whom animals are consigned, and exhibitor shall make, keep,
and maintain records or forms which fully and correctly disclose the information in this subpart CFR 2.75(b)(1)(i-vii)
concerning animals other than dogs and cats, purchased or otherwise acquired, owned, held, leased, or otherwise in his
or her possession or under his or her control, or which is transported, sold, euthanized, or otherwise disposed of by that
dealer or be corrected by
Correct by 10 June 2025

The facility is not providing a suitable method to rapidly eliminate excess water from the outdoor housing area. The facility
utilizes a 3-sided barn, covering 2 large open stalls that is the only provided shelter for 32 goats and 11 fallow deer. The
area leading into the shelter structure which is the only entrance for the animals is not draining water adequately and the
excess water has caused the area to become filled with thick mud and some areas of standing water. The animals must
walk through the mud and water to gain access to the sheltered area.
Enclosures that do not drain effectively and in which the ground contains mud and standing water with no dry path to the
shelter, can cause animals to develop hoof or skin issues due to excessive moisture and mud exposure. Correct by
ensuring that a suitable method is provided to rapidly eliminate excess water within the animals' primary enclosure and
ensure that the animals can access their shelter without walking through mud and water.
Correct by 10 June 2025
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
n

narrative:
2.75(b)(1) 
   
Records: Dealers and exhibitors. 
At the time of inspection, the facility does not have updated records of acquisition and disposition. The facility is missing 
the disposition records for a fallow deer (unknown disposition date) and a goat that was sold on 7 May 2025. 
 
The records of acquisition, disposition, and animals on hand are necessary to track the movement of animals. Every 
dealer other than operators of auction sales and brokers to whom animals are consigned, and exhibitor shall make, keep, 
and maintain records or forms which fully and correctly disclose the information in this subpart CFR 2.75(b)(1)(i-vii) 
concerning animals other than dogs and cats, purchased or otherwise acquired, owned, held, leased, or otherwise in his 
or her possession or under his or her control, or which is transported, sold, euthanized, or otherwise disposed of by that 
dealer or be corrected by  
Correct by 10 June 2025 
3.127(c) 
   
Facilities, outdoor. 
The facility is not providing a suitable method to rapidly eliminate excess water from the outdoor housing area. The facility 
utilizes a 3-sided barn, covering 2 large open stalls that is the only provided shelter for 32 goats and 11 fallow deer. The 
area leading into the shelter structure which is the only entrance for the animals is not draining water adequately and the 
excess water has caused the area to become filled with thick mud and some areas of standing water. The animals must 
walk through the mud and water to gain access to the sheltered area.  
 
Enclosures that do not drain effectively and in which the ground contains mud and standing water with no dry path to the 
shelter, can cause animals to develop hoof or skin issues due to excessive moisture and mud exposure. Correct by 
ensuring that a suitable method is provided to rapidly eliminate excess water within the animals' primary enclosure and 
ensure that the animals can access their shelter without walking through mud and water.  
Correct by 10 June 2025 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.

n
